00014 # include "QuEST.h"
00015 # include "QuEST_precision.h"
00016 # include "QuEST_internal.h"
00017 # include "QuEST_qasm.h"
00018 
00019 # include <math.h>
00020 # include <stdio.h>
00021 # include <stdlib.h>
00022 # include <string.h>
00023 
00024 # define QUREG_LABEL "q"        // QASM var-name for the quantum register
00025 # define MESREG_LABEL "c"       // QASM var-name for the classical measurement register
00026 # define CTRL_LABEL_PREF "c"    // QASM syntax which prefixes gates when controlled
00027 # define MEASURE_CMD "measure"  // QASM cmd for measurement operation
00028 # define INIT_ZERO_CMD "reset"  // QASM cmd for setting state 0
00029 # define COMMENT_PREF "//"     // QASM syntax for a comment ;)
00030 
00031 # define MAX_LINE_LEN 200       // maximum length (#chars) of a single QASM instruction
00032 # define BUF_INIT_SIZE 1000     // initial size of the QASM buffer (#chars)
00033 # define BUF_GROW_FAC 2         // growth factor when buffer dynamically resizes
00034 
00035 static const char* qasmGateLabels[] = {
00036     [GATE_SIGMA_X] = "x",
00037     [GATE_SIGMA_Y] = "y",
00038     [GATE_SIGMA_Z] = "z",
00039     [GATE_T] = "t",
00040     [GATE_S] = "s",
00041     [GATE_HADAMARD] = "h",
00042     [GATE_ROTATE_X] = "Rx",
00043     [GATE_ROTATE_Y] = "Ry",
00044     [GATE_ROTATE_Z] = "Rz",
00045     [GATE_UNITARY] = "U",     // needs phase fix when controlled
00046     [GATE_PHASE_SHIFT] = "Rz" // needs phase fix when controlled
00047 };
00048 
00049 // @TODO make a proper internal error thing
00050 void bufferOverflow() {
00051     printf("!!!\nINTERNAL ERROR: QASM line buffer filled!\n!!!");
00052     exit(1);
00053 }
00054 
00055 void qasm_setup(Qureg* qureg) {
00056     
00057     // populate and attach QASM logger
00058     QASMLogger *qasmLog = malloc(sizeof *qasmLog);
00059     qureg->qasmLog = qasmLog;
00060     if (qasmLog == NULL)
00061         bufferOverflow();
00062     
00063     qasmLog->isLogging = 0;
00064     qasmLog->bufferSize = BUF_INIT_SIZE;
00065     qasmLog->buffer = malloc(qasmLog->bufferSize * sizeof *(qasmLog->buffer));
00066     if (qasmLog->buffer == NULL)
00067         bufferOverflow();
00068     
00069     // add headers and quantum / classical register creation
00070     qasmLog->bufferFill = snprintf(
00071         qasmLog->buffer, qasmLog->bufferSize,
00072         "OPENQASM 2.0;\nqreg %s[%d];\ncreg %s[%d];\n", 
00073         QUREG_LABEL, qureg->numQubitsRepresented,
00074         MESREG_LABEL, qureg->numQubitsRepresented);
00075     if (qasmLog->bufferFill >= qasmLog->bufferSize)
00076         bufferOverflow();
00077 }
00078 
00079 void qasm_startRecording(Qureg qureg) {
00080     qureg.qasmLog->isLogging = 1;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void qasm_stopRecording(Qureg qureg) {
00084     qureg.qasmLog->isLogging = 0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void addStringToQASM(Qureg qureg, char line[], int lineLen) {
00088     
00089     char* buf = qureg.qasmLog->buffer;
00090     int bufSize = qureg.qasmLog->bufferSize;
00091     int bufFill = qureg.qasmLog->bufferFill;
00092     
00093     // grow QASM buffer if necessary
00094     if (lineLen + bufFill > bufSize) {
00095                 
00096         int newBufSize = BUF_GROW_FAC * bufSize;
00097         if (lineLen + bufFill > newBufSize)
00098             bufferOverflow();
00099         
00100         char* newBuffer = malloc(newBufSize * sizeof *newBuffer);
00101         sprintf(newBuffer, "%s", buf);
00102         free(buf);
00103         
00104         qureg.qasmLog->bufferSize = newBufSize;
00105         qureg.qasmLog->buffer = newBuffer;
00106         bufSize = newBufSize;
00107         buf = newBuffer;
00108     }
00109         
00110     // add new str
00111     int addedChars = snprintf(buf+bufFill, bufSize-bufFill, "%s", line);
00112     qureg.qasmLog->bufferFill += addedChars;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void qasm_recordComment(Qureg qureg, char* comment) {
00116     
00117     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00118         return;
00119     
00120     char line[MAX_LINE_LEN + 1]; // for trailing \0
00121     int len = snprintf(line, MAX_LINE_LEN, "%s %s\n", COMMENT_PREF, comment);
00122     addStringToQASM(qureg, line, len);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void addGateToQASM(Qureg qureg, TargetGate gate, int* controlQubits, int numControlQubits, int targetQubit, qreal* params, int numParams) {
00126     
00127     int len = 0;
00128     char line[MAX_LINE_LEN + 1]; // for trailing \0
00129     
00130     // add control labels
00131     for (int i=0; i < numControlQubits; i++)
00132         len += snprintf(line+len, MAX_LINE_LEN-len, "%s", CTRL_LABEL_PREF);
00133     
00134     // add target gate
00135     len += snprintf(line+len, MAX_LINE_LEN-len, "%s", qasmGateLabels[gate]);
00136     
00137     // add parameters
00138     if (numParams > 0) {
00139         len += snprintf(line+len, MAX_LINE_LEN-len, "(");
00140         for (int i=0; i < numParams; i++) {
00141             len += snprintf(line+len, MAX_LINE_LEN-len, REAL_QASM_FORMAT, params[i]);
00142             if (i != numParams - 1)
00143                 len += snprintf(line+len, MAX_LINE_LEN-len, ",");
00144         }
00145         len += snprintf(line+len, MAX_LINE_LEN-len, ")");
00146     }
00147     
00148     // add space
00149     len += snprintf(line+len, MAX_LINE_LEN-len, " ");
00150     
00151     // add control qubits
00152     for (int i=0; i < numControlQubits; i++)
00153         len += snprintf(line+len, MAX_LINE_LEN-len, "%s[%d],", QUREG_LABEL, controlQubits[i]);
00154     
00155     // add target qubit, colon and newline
00156     len += snprintf(line+len, MAX_LINE_LEN-len, "%s[%d];\n", QUREG_LABEL, targetQubit);
00157     
00158     // check whether we overflowed buffer
00159     if (len >= MAX_LINE_LEN)
00160         bufferOverflow();
00161         
00162     addStringToQASM(qureg, line, len);
00163 }
00164 
00165 void qasm_recordGate(Qureg qureg, TargetGate gate, int targetQubit) {
00166     
00167     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00168         return;
00169     
00170     addGateToQASM(qureg, gate, NULL, 0, targetQubit, NULL, 0);
00171 }
00172 
00173 void qasm_recordParamGate(Qureg qureg, TargetGate gate, int targetQubit, qreal param) {
00174     
00175     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00176         return;
00177     
00178     qreal params[1] = {param};
00179     addGateToQASM(qureg, gate, NULL, 0, targetQubit, params, 1);
00180 }

00182 void qasm_recordCompactUnitary(Qureg qureg, Complex alpha, Complex beta, int targetQubit) {
00183     
00184     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00185         return;
00186     
00187     qreal rz2, ry, rz1;
00188     getZYZRotAnglesFromComplexPair(alpha, beta, &rz2, &ry, &rz1);
00189     
00190     qreal params[3] = {rz2, ry, rz1};
00191     addGateToQASM(qureg, GATE_UNITARY, NULL, 0, targetQubit, params, 3);
00192 }
00193 
00194 void qasm_recordUnitary(Qureg qureg, ComplexMatrix2 u, int targetQubit) {
00195     
00196     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00197         return;
00198     
00199     Complex alpha, beta;
00200     qreal discardedGlobalPhase;
00201     getComplexPairAndPhaseFromUnitary(u, &alpha, &beta, &discardedGlobalPhase);
00202     
00203     qreal rz2, ry, rz1;
00204     getZYZRotAnglesFromComplexPair(alpha, beta, &rz2, &ry, &rz1);
00205     
00206     qreal params[3] = {rz2, ry, rz1};
00207     addGateToQASM(qureg, GATE_UNITARY, NULL, 0, targetQubit, params, 3);
00208 }

00210 void qasm_recordAxisRotation(Qureg qureg, qreal angle, Vector axis, const int targetQubit) {
00211     
00212     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00213         return;
00214     
00215     Complex alpha, beta;
00216     getComplexPairFromRotation(angle, axis, &alpha, &beta);
00217     
00218     qreal rz2, ry, rz1;
00219     getZYZRotAnglesFromComplexPair(alpha, beta, &rz2, &ry, &rz1);
00220     
00221     qreal params[3] = {rz2, ry, rz1};
00222     addGateToQASM(qureg, GATE_UNITARY, NULL, 0, targetQubit, params, 3);
00223 }

00225 void qasm_recordControlledGate(Qureg qureg, TargetGate gate, int controlQubit, int targetQubit) {
00226 
00227     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00228         return;
00229     
00230     int controls[1] = {controlQubit};
00231     addGateToQASM(qureg, gate, controls, 1, targetQubit, 0, 0);    
00232 }
00233 
00234 void qasm_recordControlledParamGate(Qureg qureg, TargetGate gate, int controlQubit, int targetQubit, qreal param) {
00235 
00236     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00237         return;
00238     
00239     int controls[1] = {controlQubit};
00240     qreal params[1] = {param};
00241     addGateToQASM(qureg, gate, controls, 1, targetQubit, params, 1);
00242     
00243     // correct the global phase of controlled phase shifts
00244     if (gate == GATE_PHASE_SHIFT) {
00245         qasm_recordComment(qureg, "Restoring the discarded global phase of the previous controlled phase gate");
00246         qreal phaseFix[1] = {param/2.0};
00247         addGateToQASM(qureg, GATE_ROTATE_Z, NULL, 0, targetQubit, phaseFix, 1);
00248     }
00249 }

00265 void qasm_recordControlledUnitary(Qureg qureg, ComplexMatrix2 u, int controlQubit, int targetQubit) {
00266     
00267     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00268         return;
00269     
00270     Complex alpha, beta;
00271     qreal globalPhase;
00272     getComplexPairAndPhaseFromUnitary(u, &alpha, &beta, &globalPhase);
00273     
00274     qreal rz2, ry, rz1;
00275     getZYZRotAnglesFromComplexPair(alpha, beta, &rz2, &ry, &rz1);
00276     
00277     int controls[1] = {controlQubit};
00278     qreal params[3] = {rz2, ry, rz1};
00279     addGateToQASM(qureg, GATE_UNITARY, controls, 1, targetQubit, params, 3);
00280     
00281     // add Rz
00282     qasm_recordComment(qureg, "Restoring the discarded global phase of the previous controlled unitary");
00283     qreal phaseFix[1] = {globalPhase};
00284     addGateToQASM(qureg, GATE_ROTATE_Z, NULL, 0, targetQubit, phaseFix, 1);
00285 }

00311 void qasm_recordMultiControlledParamGate(Qureg qureg, TargetGate gate, int* controlQubits, const int numControlQubits, const int targetQubit, qreal param) {
00312     
00313     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00314         return;
00315     
00316     qreal params[1] = {param};
00317     addGateToQASM(qureg, gate, controlQubits, numControlQubits, targetQubit, params, 1);
00318     
00319     // correct the global phase of controlled phase shifts
00320     if (gate == GATE_PHASE_SHIFT) {
00321         qasm_recordComment(qureg, "Restoring the discarded global phase of the previous multicontrolled phase gate");
00322         qreal phaseFix[1] = {param/2.0};
00323         addGateToQASM(qureg, GATE_ROTATE_Z, NULL, 0, targetQubit, phaseFix, 1);

00365 void qasm_recordMeasurement(Qureg qureg, const int measureQubit) {
00366 
00367     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00368         return;
00369     
00370     char line[MAX_LINE_LEN + 1]; // for trailing \0
00371     int len = snprintf(
00372         line, MAX_LINE_LEN, "%s %s[%d] -> %s[%d];\n",
00373         MEASURE_CMD, QUREG_LABEL, measureQubit, MESREG_LABEL, measureQubit);
00374         
00375     // check whether we overflowed buffer
00376     if (len >= MAX_LINE_LEN)
00377         bufferOverflow();
00378     
00379     addStringToQASM(qureg, line, len);
00380 }

00382 void qasm_recordInitZero(Qureg qureg) {
00383     
00384     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00385         return;
00386     
00387     char line[MAX_LINE_LEN + 1]; // for trailing \0
00388     int len = snprintf(line, MAX_LINE_LEN, "%s %s;\n", INIT_ZERO_CMD, QUREG_LABEL);
00389     
00390     // check whether we overflowed buffer
00391     if (len >= MAX_LINE_LEN)
00392         bufferOverflow();
00393     
00394     addStringToQASM(qureg, line, len);
00395 }

00397 void qasm_recordInitPlus(Qureg qureg) {
00398     
00399     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00400         return;
00401     
00402     // add an explanatory comment
00403     char buf[MAX_LINE_LEN+1];
00404     sprintf(buf, "Initialising state |+>");
00405     qasm_recordComment(qureg, buf);
00406     
00407     // it's valid QASM to h the register (I think)
00408     // |+> = H |0>
00409     qasm_recordInitZero(qureg);
00410     int charsWritten = snprintf(
00411         buf, MAX_LINE_LEN, "%s %s;\n", 
00412         qasmGateLabels[GATE_HADAMARD], QUREG_LABEL);
00413     if (charsWritten >= MAX_LINE_LEN)
00414         bufferOverflow();
00415     addStringToQASM(qureg, buf, charsWritten);
00416     
00417     // old code (before above QASM shortcut)
00418     /*
00419     qasm_recordInitZero(qureg);
00420     for (int q=0; q < qureg.numQubitsRepresented; q++)
00421         qasm_recordGate(qureg, GATE_HADAMARD, q);
00422     */
00423 }
00424 
00425 void qasm_recordInitClassical(Qureg qureg, long long int stateInd) {
00426     
00427     if (!qureg.qasmLog->isLogging)
00428         return;
00429     
00430     // add an explanatory comment
00431     char cmt[MAX_LINE_LEN+1];
00432     sprintf(cmt, "Initialising state |%lld>", stateInd);
00433     qasm_recordComment(qureg, cmt);
00434     
00435     // start in |0>
00436     qasm_recordInitZero(qureg);
00437     
00438     // NOT the 1 bits in stateInd
00439     for (int q=0; q < qureg.numQubitsRepresented; q++) 
00440         if ((stateInd >> q) & 1)
00441             qasm_recordGate(qureg, GATE_SIGMA_X, q);
00442 }
00443 
00444 void qasm_clearRecorded(Qureg qureg) {
00445     
00446     // maintains current buffer size
00447     (qureg.qasmLog->buffer)[0] = '\0';
00448     qureg.qasmLog->bufferFill = 0;
00449 }

00451 void qasm_printRecorded(Qureg qureg) {
00452     printf("%s", qureg.qasmLog->buffer);
00453 }

00456 int qasm_writeRecordedToFile(Qureg qureg, char* filename) {
00457     
00458     FILE *file = fopen(filename, "w");
00459     if (file == NULL)
00460         return 0;
00461     
00462     fprintf(file, "%s", qureg.qasmLog->buffer);
00463     fclose(file);
00464     return 1;
00465 }
00466 
00467 void qasm_free(Qureg qureg) {
00468     
00469     free(qureg.qasmLog->buffer);
00470     free(qureg.qasmLog);
00471 }
